Class HighScoreManager

java.lang.Object
  HighScoreManager

public class HighScoreManager
extends Object

HighScoreManager is the class responsible for creating, loading and updating the scores file

Author:
Samu

Constructor Detail

HighScoreManager

public HighScoreManager()
Constructor does not take any parameters. It just creates a new ArrayList of type Score and assignes it to variable scores

Method Detail

addScore

public void addScore(String name,
                     int score)
Method that loads the scores file, adds a new username and its score to the ArrayList score and updates the file

Parameters:
name - - username
score - - user' score

getHighscoreString

public String getHighscoreString()
Method that runs through the ArrayList scores and return each element individually

Returns:
highScoreString - value that each time will contain a different element of the ArrayList scores

getScores

public ArrayList<Score> getScores()
Method responsible for calling methods that load and sort the scores

Returns:
scores - will return the ArrayList scores sorted

loadScoreFile

public void loadScoreFile()
Method that loads the scores file

reset

public void reset()
This method is not used on the program but it was created for extensibility, ie. a reset can be added to the program, where only the administrator can access it through the use of a password. In this case, the button action would be linked to this method

updateScoreFile

public void updateScoreFile()
Method that update the scores file by writing any relevant score
